fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Role Call: Choose any non-Unique GIM role. In the following day, if someone is voted to be executed, they will instead survive and be converted into a Rebel-aligned version of the role you chose.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All Rebels will share the same goal as you.
- You will have a private chat once someone is converted, but not a factional attack.
- You are immune to Conversion.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill anyone who would oppose you and the Rebels.
